acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped long values with @PodamLongValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleLongValues

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.LongValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the long field 0 should be greater or equal to zero
Then the long field 38 should be less than 100
Then the long field 306 should have a value comprised between 0 and 1000
Then the long object value 0 should not be null
Then the long field 0 should be greater or equal to zero
Then the long object value 15 should not be null
Then the long field 0 should be less than 100
Then the long object value 876 should not be null
Then the long field 876 should have a value comprised between 0 and 1000
Then the long value should be precisely 12345678912
Then the long object value 12345678912 should not be null
Then the long value should be precisely 12345678912
